title: 682: TRENDS PUT BITCOIN RIGHT ON TRACK FOR $250K BY 2022, SAYS BILLIONAIRE TIM DRAPER!!!!!
description:
Tim Draper talked about BTC in a recent interview noting some trends which he believes will be the driving force behind bitcoin hitting $250K in 2022.

When asked when he planned to sell his coins, the billionaire replied, “Why would I want to sell the future currency for the past currency? I just can’t imagine anything more important for humanity than this.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

itunes:subtitle: Venture capitalist Tim Draper was on Benzinga’s Crypto Festival to talk about the number 1 cryptocurrency BTC. Draper noted some trends which he believes will be the driving force behind bitcoin hitting $250,000 in 2022. Widespread adoption was one...
